basics.name: Leerang Yang
basics.summary: I am a computational scientist interested in the intersection of machine learning, biology, chemistry, and engineering.

work.name: 1910 Genetics
work.summary: I am working on generative models for molecular design by leveraging data from high-throughput experiments and physics based simulations.

work.name: Apriori Bio
work.summary: Apriori Bio is developing next-generation vaccines by leveraging high-throughput functional experiments, viral sequence and structure dataset, and machine learning models. I develop machine learning models, design protein libraries, and design novel immunogen sequences for in vitro/in vivo testing

work.name: Flagship Pioneering
work.summary: Flagship Pioneering creates life sciences companies. I worked on ideation for new companies that use machine learning and systems biology to develop new therapeutics.

work.name: Massachusetts Institute of Technology
work.summary: I built large-scale stochastic evolutionary models combined with dynamic models to describe the evolution of antibody responses after vaccination.

work.name: Republic of Korea Air Force
work.summary: Served for 2 years in the Korean Air Force as a military translator. I was responsible for translating military documents and interpreting for joint drills with the U.S.

volunteer.summary: Weekly outreach to engage in conversations and distribute essentials to people at central square experiencing homelessness.

awards.title: Kwanjeong Educational Foundation Scholar
awards.summary: Four year scholarship for graduate studies

awards.title: Charles F. Bonilla Medal
awards.summary: An award for outstanding academic merit in Chemical Engineering

awards.title: Egleston Scholar
awards.summary: A comprehensive four-year program designed to support and enrich the undergraduate experience of the most highly accomplished students through select access to resources within Columbia Engineering

awards.title: Korean Presidential Science Fellowship
awards.summary: Four year full-tuition scholarship for undergraduate study'
